title: Online forums level glitch
body:
Hello Riot,
   within the last couple weeks I have hit lvl 30, but the forums online doesn't want to update my level. It has said i am lvl 4 forever now and I have logged in and out multiple times to see if it was bugged. Just trying to figure out if I can get this fixed. Thanks

replies.body: Your account may need to sync with the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has updated everything, so all looks well now!  Let me know if you have any issue posting.
